  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.client.gui.IGuiEventListener, net.minecraft.client.gui.IHasContainer<T>, net.minecraft.client.gui.INestedGuiEventHandler, net.minecraft.client.gui.IRenderable, net.minecraft.client.gui.screen.IScreen, IValueNotifiable

    public abstract class ContainerScreenScrolling<T extends ScrollingInventoryContainer>
extends ContainerScreenExtended<T>
    Gui for an inventory container that has a scrollbar and search field.
